updateSingle:
UPDATE NOTIFIER SET
            subscriber_id=@subscriber_id,
owner_group_id=@owner_group_id,
source=@source
            WHERE notifier_id=@notifier_id
countAll: SELECT COUNT(*) as records FROM NOTIFIER
countBYsubscriber_id:
SELECT COUNT(*) as records FROM NOTIFIER 
          WHERE subscriber_id=@subscriber_id
countBYowner_group_id:
SELECT COUNT(*) as records FROM NOTIFIER 
          WHERE owner_group_id=@owner_group_id
